generateStructuralNodeData

private void generateStructuralNodeData(org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Generates the structuralNodeData node with one structuralData node for each AristaFlow node. They include type and IDs of the AristaFlow node.

root - Element where generated structuralNodeData nodes are added to
